div.p: As an administrator I do enjoy the job but it’s not challenging enough for me and I’ve been doing the same job for about 4 years
so I started my own little business just doing mobile spray tanning and the more business I built up I just really enjoyed it
and I thought it would be so good to be your own boss and just do something that you really enjoy; I just like the fact that
I can build it up the way I want it built up, you know, do the treatments that I want to do and that I feel comfortable doing
employ and have people working for me that I think are good people, you know working for yourself is really rewarding at the end of the day
